name: Drosoph Hotel
detailed_description:
What Is Drosoph Hotel?


Drosoph Hotel is two games in one, that allows you to play as guest of a terrifying hotel or the manager, all in a 2.5D game.
As a manager, you will scare/eliminate guests and recruit their souls in order to expand, personalize and defend the hotel against the adversities that can arise during your watch.
In other instance you can play as multiple guest in their enigmatic journey through the Hotel, as you solve multiple puzzles and help them survive in this old hotel.

The World Inside The Hotel


The story take place in The Pines, a city that was once heavenly beauty with great prosperity.
This city was hunted by unexpected events, but the ones with more impact were a series of intense and unexplainable fires. Due to the magnitude and the frequency of the fires, there is no acknowledge of when this events started, but consequently The Pines slowly became known by the folks as “Orange Pines.”
One of those fires burned all The Pines Grand Hotel, the newspapers pointed out that the concierge, John Pinghundred, may be the one who started it, but the rumors are that all these events are linked to the pagan god Anku.
Anku is both feared and worshiped by the citizens, his fans describe him as the protector of the human race and suggest that days are approaching when overpopulation will be the biggest problem in the world.

Game Features

Endless mode
Manager simulator
You can build up to 22 different rooms, manage your ghosts, monsters and skills to scare your guests and fight against 7 different hunters.

Survival mode
Manager simulator
In this game mode you will need to both "ascend" ghosts and build a certain number of rooms in order to complete waves before the time runs out. Keep an eye on the hunters, since they will not hesitate to kill your ghosts, so you will have to prepare yourself with your monsters.

Victim mode
Guest point of view
Unfold the history of the hotel through the guest point of view, solve riddles and help carry out the mysteries that this hotel offers.

Challenge mode
Coming soon
Test your skills in Drosoph Hotel and discover if you are really up to the job of being Anku´s right hand.

Key Features

  • You’ll play as the Hotel manager with monsters and ghost as your allies or help a Guest to survive the creepy Hotel.
  • Build your own Hotel and scare your guests with many creepy powers
  • Play in Survival, Infinite and Story Mode
  • Use your ghosts to remodel your rooms and scare your guests
  • Many different kind of strange deaths for unexpected traps
  • Zombies and monsters join together to defend your hotel
  • Make your own strategy to defend and survive the hunters
  • Make your own zombie army
  • Upgrade your underworld powers
  • Collect all the kind of ghosts
  • Survival horror game
  • Unravel the dark history of the hotel
  • As a guest solve multiple puzzle and survive a place plagued by monsters and traps

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 3.3GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or Graphics card: DX9 (shader 3.0 model)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
